about_the_game: Experience the pulse-pounding demo of Korlax Escape! Pilot a UFO through treacherous environments, battling aliens and monsters as you strive for a daring escape. Immerse yourself in stunning visuals, engage in adrenaline-fueled combat, and uncover the captivating lore of this epic adventure. Will you survive the challenges and secure your freedom? Get a taste of the excitement and prepare for an unforgettable gaming experience. Download the demo now and embark on the journey of Korlax Escape!
